title: Balya Organik Cafe
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Organic, Western, Juice bar, Take-out, Turkish, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Cafe attached to a market, reported all veg except for fish. Offers soups, salads, sandwiches, Turkish veggie dishes, breakfast items like hot oatmeal and pancakes. Also has veggie burger with ginger-tahini sauce, fresh juices, desserts like vegan carrot cake, brownies, oatmeal cookies, granola bars, organic coffee and tea.
